section.p: If you are installing Helion Code Engine, add and populate the helionce section of the clouds.yml file as described below. All fields are required unless otherwise indicated.

p.note: This section begins indented two spaces; look at the complete file to see how all the sections fit together.

section.codeblock: helionce: deployer_key: helionce-shared deployer_flavor: 3 deployer_ntp_servers: ntpservers deployer_dns_servers: dnsservers deployer_cloud: 'mycloud'

dlentry.dd: The flavor to use for the deployer instance,
Do not change this value. Creating a Large deployer (value: 4) may result in a No space in directory error message.
This value must match the name of the section you created in the Platform Configuration section. In the examples, the name is mycloud
